A place where merchant can get a roof over one's head and a plate of food.
A building where a zeppelin docks to pickup and drop off passengers.
A place where travellers of all sorts can rest.
In this store jewelers sells their precious masterpieces.
Many kodo beasts breeds happily on this farm.
Turtles can made it to these water pools.
Sharp-eyed eagles that live here help merchants avoid dangerous paths.
Big, but not really bad wolves are used here for transporting goods.
Charms against curses, misfortune and greedy merchants is produced and sold here. No returns or refunds. Ever.
Here hard stones are used in ever harder mason's work.
Candlemakers works here as long as nobody don't touch them.
Merchant bots sell other merchant bots here.\n"Beep-boop, dear customer."
Even if these craftsmans smells fishy, they produce and sell extremely beautiful coralwork.
A place that have portals to many places across Azeroth.
